name: Control information disclosure
summary: Share information strategically to create value and trust while protecting leverage-sensitive facts (e.g., true bottom line, privileged constraints).
counterparty_guidance: Probe for specifics and verify claims; don’t rely on vague anchors or unnamed benchmarks.
Offer reciprocal, low-risk information exchange to build trust.
If they overshare, avoid exploiting in a way that damages long-term relationship (if relevant).

ui.card_summary: Reveal enough to move talks forward—without giving away leverage.

online_reference.title: When Not to Show Your Hand in Negotiations (PON)
